titles.title: To amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary:
1/11/2007--Introduced.
Amends civil service law concerning federal workers' compensation to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
